If you want to use your own device (iOS / Android).
You can mark your attendance from your own Android & iOS Devices also.

Please Note : Two applications are to be installed.

1. Aadhar Face RD - This is a Gateway application which is used by below mentioned application. Just install it.
2. AEBAS Attendance App - This is used by you. You need to open it everyday to mark Attendance.

Steps for Android Device

1. Download "Face RD" app from play store. Direct Link
2. Download below mentioned app. Direct Link
3. Reach office, you can mark attendance only in office perimeter ~50 meters.
4. Open "AEBAS app", Choose "Central Non Delhi in Dropdown and enter your last 8 digits of Aadhar number. Choose Entry Point "NICPR Noida" in next dropdown.
5. Show Face & Blink. (App will scan your face and you will see green circle, it means your face is identified, just blink to verify).
6. Facing any issue ? Connect with Mr. Manupal Choudhary, TO-B (IT/CS) in IT Cell.

Steps for iOS Device

1. Download "AadhaarFACERD" app from app store. Direct Link
2. Download "AadhaarBAS" app. Direct Link
3. Reach office, you can mark attendance only in office perimeter ~50 meters.
4. Open "AadhaarBAS", Choose "Central Non Delhi in Dropdown and enter your last 8 digits of Aadhar number. Choose Entry Point "NICPR Noida" in next dropdown.
5. Show Face & Blink. (App will scan your face and you will see green circle, it means your face is identified, just blink to verify).
6. Facing any issue ? Connect with Mr. Manupal Choudhary, TO-B (IT/CS) in IT Cell.
